name: Microwave
description: Client (F/44, muslim) lives with her husband in a 2-rm rental flat. Client is visually impaired and is largely reliant on her husband to prepare food for her. When her husband is working, she eats instant noodle and only does simple cooking, like frying egg. Family hopes to get a microwave (halal) so that client can prepare her own food better at home alone.

contact.name: Louise Quek

name: Refrigerator
description: Mitsubishi Model MRY47T fridge. 472litres, 1.8x0.69x0.70m, 4 compartments, used in good condition.

name: Study set up
description:
Single mother with 5 children, one of whom is an infant. The family is looking to start tuition sessions in Jan 2022, and would require a set up to facilitate learning. She is currently not working as she is pending infantcare placement. Infant's father is currently incarcerated. 

Client would benefit from 2 Standing Fans. Standing fans are preferred due to the infant who may crawl around and put his fingers into the blades.

name: Fridge (2 Door)
description:
Dear Donor, we have 2 elderly gentlemen above 65 who managed to get an HDB rental unit after several decades. This is going to be their fixed accomodation for the golden period of their lives. Hope you could assist them with several items as housewarming gifts. Donors, please assist to cover the cost of transport.

- 2 door wardrobe
- 2 door Fridge
- Washing machine
- Induction Cooker
- Microwave oven
- Rice Cooker
- Kettle
- Table & Chairs
- kitchen cabinet (movable)

Donors, please assist to cover the cost of transport.
Thank you very much for your kind donation.

name: Fridge
description:
Elderly from a low income family will be moving out to stay in a rental flat and needs basic electrical home appliances such as fridge to store food. 

You may whatsapp Jaslin at 97219039 if you have one to donate. Thank you!

name: Flat screen TV (32 to 42 inches)
description: Elderly malay uncle 90 yrs old living in HDB 1-room rental flat has to change his TV. His current TV has sound but no picture. Note that size of TV has to be 42 inches or smaller due to space constraints. Many Thanks.

(L size Air Fit MamyPoko Pants - 2 packets, Dulac Milk Powder Stage 1 - 2 tins, Friso Gold Milk Cereal - 2 tins).

description: Family of 5 with 2 schooling children and 1 baby. Father on dialysis past 7 years, unable to earn much, resulting in debts. Mother trying to make ends meet. Having a milk powder supply would greatly alleviate the family's stress.

description: Family of 7, with 5 children requires short-term milk powder support for the youngest son. Husband is the sole breadwinner and has unstable income due to his health condition. Wife is unable to work due to caregiving of her children and is currently pregnant.

name: Food Rations (Halal)
description: Client is a housewife who had recently separated from her husband. She is caring for her 4yr old daughter. The separation resulted in financial difficulties in challenges in meeting her and her daughter's basic needs such as food and diapers. Seeking donations for Halal certified frozen food such as nuggets, hotdogs. Food rations such as maggi (curry), cooking oil, Marigold UHT Packet Milk - Chocolate 1l. 10packets.

name: 10 tubs X 2.75kg of Planta Margarine
description: We are requesting for 10 tubs of 2.75kg of Planta Margarine for cooking use or meal for our residents from Monday to Saturday. The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premises.

name: Ensure Liquid (Strawberry Flavour)
description:
Patient is a 79 year old male who is married with a son. He requires assistance with his Activities of Daily Living (ADLs). Patient’s son is unemployed as he is the main caregiver for patient.
 
Patient was recommended by hospital to consume 2 cans of Ensure Liquid daily to supplement his diet. The family has difficulty affording the ongoing medical consumables due to son’s unemployment. 
The item can be found here: https://rehabmart.com.sg/nursing/nutrition/wellness-nutrition/ensure-liquid-strawberry (Rehab Mart) or https://www.pinkpharm.com/products/ensure-liquid-250ml?_pos=1&_sid=62c0a0f5d&_ss=r (PinkPharm). 

Kindly arrange for the donated items to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can WhatsApp Jia Ling at 82479135 for details. Thank you!

name: Cat foods and necessities
description: Family with children facing financial strains are caring for 10 cats. They would need some support to purchase necessities for the cats while we work with family to seek for adopters.

name: Citravescent
description:
Patient is a 60 year old gentleman who is paralysed waist down. He has been unemployed since 2017 due to medical conditions and relies on his helper for his Activities of Daily Living (ADLs). Patient is receiving insurance payout, however is only sufficient to cover the helper fees and their daily expenditures.
He requires the use of citravescent three times a day due to his medical condition on a long-term basis, however is unable to afford them. The item can be found on Shopee: https://bit.ly/3pl1w04 or Lazada: https://bit.ly/3qYjSUW . You can also buy at any shops. Kindly arrange the donated items to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can contact Jia Ling at 82479135 via WhatsApp. Thank you.

name: Food rations
description: Hi there, I am looking for a kind donor to donate food rations for a family of 5. If you are keen, please email me and I will give you the list of food requested by the family. Thanks in advance.

name: Milk Powder (Lactogen Stage 3)
description: Single mother of 2 young children requires short-term milk powder support. Mother is looking for job and family currently has unstable financial situation as she is the sole breadwinner of the family.

name: Alfred Piano Books
description: Single mother with 2 school-going children requires Alfred's Piano book level 1A/1B/3. ABSM Grade 1. Please contact social worker Christopher. Thank you.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Navarraj

name: Eureka Books
description: Single mother with 2 school-going children requires Eureka books (part1,2&3) for primary school.  Please contact social worker Christopher.  Thank you

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Navarraj

name: Need Pediasure TripleSure Milk Powder
description: The Child is unable to take solid food and depends on the milk powder for nutrients.  He needs 10 tins of 850g of Pediasure TripleSure Milk Powder every month.   Items will be directly delivered to beneficiary's and please contact us for delivery details. (Email: dik@childrensociety.org.sg; Contact No.: 9436 7401; Point of Contact: Ms Peng Hui). Every little donation makes a big difference and thank you for your kind support!

name: NAN OPTIPRO HA 1
description: Couple has recently welcomed a new born. Father of the child works as a grab delivery man but but due to low income, the couple has difficulty sustaining the needs of the new born child. Client has requested for milk powder - NAN OPTIPRO HA 1.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Bukit Batok
contact.name: Hannah Lim

name: Ensure Milk Vanilla
description: Client with a physical disability. She drinks Ensure Life milk Vanilla for nutrition daily. She would need a carton of Ensure milk for a monthly supply.

name: Habhal's Kicap Manis (Soya Bean Sauce) - Sweet
description: PPIS Family Service Centre (West) would like to appeal for 30-50 Habhal's Kicap Manis (Soya Bean Sauce) - Sweet for its beneficiaries. Thank You

name: Baba's Packet Curry Powder - Meat & fish
description: PPIS Family Service Centre (West) would like to appeal for 30 -50 packets of Baba's Packet Curry Powder - Meat & Fish for its beneficiaries. Thank You.

name: Halal Chilli Sauce
description: PPIS Family Service Centre (West) would like to appeal for 30 - 50 Halal Chilli Sauce for its beneficiaries. Thank You.

name: Halal Rex Seasoned Cuttlefish with Soya Bean Sauce
description: PPIS Family Service Centre (West) would like to appeal for 30 -50 cans of Rex Seasoned Cuttlefish with Soya Bean Sauce for its beneficiaries. Thank You.

name: Halal Peanut Butter
description: PPIS Family Service Centre (West) would like to appeal for donation of 30-50 Halal Peanut Butter for its beneficiaries. Thank You.

name: Groceries
description:
Family of 5 children are facing financial constrains and require halal groceries: --Cooking oil
-Garlic
-Lemon grass
-Onion
-Chicken
-Meat
-Fishball
-Crabmeat
-Salt
-Sugar
-Nutella
-Maple Syrup

name: Large Cardboard Boxes
description: Looking for large cardboard carton boxes in good and usable conditions to be used by families discharged from residential services to transport their items to their new homes

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Transition Plus
contact.name: K S Vikneshan

name: Halal fresh/frozen food assistance for 6 months
description: A sole breadwinner with 9 children, has been experiencing there is still insufficient food supply (halal fresh/frozen food) due to the large family. Interested donor, please contact worker at shiyan@frcsfsc.sg or 8554-8219. Thank you very much!

name: Dog leash and muzzle
description:
Client is currently unemployed and unable to afford a leash and muzzle for her dog who has stranger anxiety. Tend to attack when brought out for walks or when visitors are over. As such, she keeps her dog at home most of the time which affects the well-being of her dog as well. Having a leash and muzzle will benefit both the dog and client. Breed of dog: Jack Russel

I can be be contacted at my work no. at 80236342 or my email at smaheswari@amkfsc.org.sg

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: S Maheswari

name: Packets of Pre-cooked Meals (Halal)
description: Family has 4 school-going children, who requires packets of pre-cooked meals (Halal) urgently, as mother is unable to prepare all of their daily meals due to her recent slipped disc diagnosis. Father is the sole breadwinner.

name: Single-size Mattress
description: Client is looking for three single-size mattress for her 3 children. Her current mattresses for the children are old and flatten. Hence, they are not comfortable for the children to sleep on and not good for their backs as well.

name: Wardrobe
description: Client is looking for a sliding 2 door wardrobe to put her clothes in. Her current wardrobe is not working well and there is limited space in her current flat. Hence, she would prefer a sliding wardrobe to save space in her room.

name: Standing cupboard
description: Single mother with 5 children, one of whom is an infant. The family is looking to start tuition sessions in Jan 2022, and would require a set up to facilitate learning. She is currently not working as she is pending infantcare placement. Infant's father is currently incarcerated. Client has belongings all over the place, causing the environment to be cluttered, serving some risk as they may fall over onto her infant. Hence, she is looking for a cupboard large enough to keep these items in place to save space and keep her child safe.
specifications: L x B x H = 85-90cm x 50cm x 180-200cm

name: Wardrobe for clothes
description: Client is a single mother with 2 young children (9/F and 5/M). Client’s spouse passed away early 2020.The family does not have their own home and were staying at open market rental, but due to financial struggle and caregiving needs by client, she applied for HDB public rental unit.HDB recently assigned a public rental unit to her, and she needs support with basic furnishing and electrical appliances. She hopes to seek help for wardrobe. For further liaison, do contact Nurul via whatsapp at 98598767.

name: Study set up
description:
Single mother with 5 children, one of whom is an infant. The family is looking to start tuition sessions in Jan 2022, and would require a set up to facilitate learning. She is currently not working as she is pending infant care placement. Infant's father is currently incarcerated. 

Client would benefit from 2 foldable tables, and 5 stackable chairs with back rest (stackable chairs required due to space constraints in a one-room flat).

name: Sofa bed
description: Low income family needs a sofa bed a family of 5 living in a 1-rm rental unit. Please respond if you are keen to donate. Note: Donor to pay for the delivery fee

name: Pull out bedframe (no mattress needed)
description: Single mother needs a pull out bunkbed frame without mattresses needed for her children. Please respond if you have one to donate. Note: Donor to pay for the delivery fee.

name: Single bed with pull out bed
description: Client is from a low-income family, looking after 6 children. The husband is the sole breadwinner but has an unstable income as he works part-time. they are looking for a bed with a pull out bed at the bottom. As they are looking at saving space and also having enough space for the children to sleep on.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services @ Taman Jurong SSO
contact.name: Charmaine Lim

name: Wardrobe
description: Client is a single elderly lady who recently moved in to her new flat and requires donation of furnitures as she does not have sufficient savings to purchase all that she needs for her house.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Tampines

name: Storage Bed Frame with Mattress
description: Client is a single elderly lady who recently moved in to her new flat and requires donation of furnitures as she does not have sufficient savings to purchase all that she needs for her house.

name: Kitchen Tabletop
description: The family has recently relocated into their HDB flat. They would appreciate for a donated TV console as they prioritise expenses on their other needs.

name: Chest of drawers
description: Client is a mother of 4 children with a recent newborn baby. Client's current chest of drawer is breaking down. Client looking for a new or 2nd hand chest of drawers to keep her children's clothes. Donor to pay for delivery fees.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Yew Tee
contact.name: Calyn Xu

name: Metal Dining Table
description: For seniors staying in 1-room rental unit.

name: TV Console
description:
This is a newlywed couple who are expecting their first child. 
After struggling to find a stable home, they are finally moving into their new rental flat. 
However, they are going through financial difficulties. 
Client is unable to afford the abovementioned item. 
Looking for a kind donor to help this family. 
Thank you.

name: Kitchen Shelves/Cabinet
description:
This is a newlywed couple who are expecting their first child. 
After struggling to find a stable home, they are finally moving into their new rental flat. 
However, they are going through financial difficulties. 
Client is unable to afford the abovementioned items. 
Client is not particular with the items, but is in need of a bed soon as she is currently pregnant. 
Looking for a kind donor to help this family. 
Thank you.

name: Small pedestal drawer
description: A single elderly with multiple medical conditions just moved into HDB rental flat. He wishes to get a small pedestal drawer to keep his items and letters, as well as functioning as a small desk for him.

name: Round Dining table with 4 chairs
description: Client is a mother of 3 children(F/14,F/6,F/8) and unfit to work due to health concern and caregiving issue. Client’s husband is the sole breadwinner of the family of 5. Your kind blessing of the following items will ease the family's tight financial situation and allow them to better organise their space. The family deeply appreciates your great support. Thank you! (Xin mo)

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: Sliding door wardrobe
description: Single mother with three children requires a sliding door wardrobe (120cm length x 190cm tall) as theirs has spoilt. Sliding door preferred due to limited space in the 1 bedroom flat. She has just started work as a hawker assistant and does not have the means to buy a new wardrobe. Appreciate if donor can deliver.

name: Loft Bunk Bed
description: Single mother with 1 school-going daughter requires a loft bunk bed (something like https://www.ikea.com/sg/en/p/stora-loft-bed-frame-white-stain-70242086/) in order for the daughter to have space below to put a study desk for her studying, and for them to have sufficient sleeping space. They are staying in a small rental flat with 1 bedroom and would like to maximise the space. Single mother is working part-time and is unable to purchase a brand new bed. Appreciate if donor can deliver.

name: Kitchen cabinet
description: Client is unemployed due to medical condition. She was unable to secure stable employment previously due to ongoing medical issues. She is certified unfit for work for 6 months w.e.f. 15/10/2021. Client has just shifted to her new 1-room rental flat. Due to financial difficulties and limited financial resources, she is unable to afford the purchase of some household items and will benefit from donation.

name: Laptop
description: A family of 6 is requesting for laptop assistance for their teenage son who needs it for his secondary education, and for mother to do online part-time jobs. Parents are unable to afford a laptop as father is the sole breadwinner of the family, while mother cares for their younger children and elderly mother. The assistance will thus be able to support both child and mother while relieving parents from further financial strain. Thank you.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Lynn Yeo

name: Laptop
description: Family of 5, with 2 children in Primary School, requires at least 1 laptop for their online home-based sessions as well as tutoring sessions. The client's spouse is not able to work due to medical issues and the family lost a substantial amount of income. Family now depends on client's income as the sole breadwinner. They are currently using the client's phone for their tutoring sessions. The donation will greatly reduce the financial stress on the couple. Item donated can be sent directly to FSC.

The donation will greatly reduce the financial stress on the couple. Item donated can be sent directly to FSC.

contact.name: Siti Raudhah Bte Azman

name: Laptop
description: Client is a single mother and just gave birth. Client would like to request a laptop so she is able to do some part-time online job while providing care to her baby. Thank you. (Xin Mo)

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: Laptop
description:
Client is currently attending a course to upgrade herself to pursue her dreams to be an early childhood educator, while caring for 4 young children. 
Family does not have a laptop and face financial challenges. 
A laptop is needed for client's course, and will also be helpful for the children if they need it for school.

name: Laptop
description: Client requires a laptop for her husband who needs it for a course he's attending to upgrade himself. Family is unable to afford purchasing one due to tight financial situation.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Chua Bee Guet

name: 2 laptops
description: Client has 5 children. 3 children in pri sch and 2 children age 1 and 2. Hb is the sole breadwinner of the family earning 1.6k a month. Family is struggling financially due to sibling's debt especially. Client plans to work next year after approved subsidised student care. Pri sch only provides laptop loans at $200 each which family cant afford. 2 laptops for the elder children would help with their HBLs and defray additional cost for family.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bukit Panjang
contact.name: Nur Ashikin Binte Hazlan

name: Laptop
description: Client is unable to seek and sustain full-time employment as she is focusing on mental health recovery. However, she has started on home-based crafting to keep herself meaningfully engaged. A laptop will be helpful for her to seek out online resources and a supportive tool as she is keeping a look out for home-based jobs. She is currently on financial assistance and has limited family support.

name: Bicycle
description: Family has 2 school going children and is currently facing financial difficulty. Therefore, there are unable to afford for things beyond their basic needs. The bicycle is for the 13 years old boy who enjoys cycling and he can cycle instead of playing computer games at home.

name: Android Tablet
description:
Client is single and staying alone. He suffers from depression and anxiety and is unfit for work. 

Client has severe insomnia, needs an Android tablet (Wifi/LTE preferred) with large screen 8" to 9", good storage/battery life. (For emails, movies, games and reading).

contact.org: MSF Social Service Office @ Kreta Ayer
contact.name: Brenda Yuen

name: Bicycle
description:
This is a 53 year old man, living with his 39yo wife. 
Together, they have a 3 yo son, living in a rental flat with his aunt-in-law. 
Due to his medical condition, the family is on financial assistance. He has been seeking employment but to no avail.
